title: cant patch 6.16 and opening patcher takes 5+ minutes.
body:
Hi there.

under here are the problems  and the 'solutions' i have already tried:

first of all, when i open the patcher, the league of legends logo appears ( as usual ), BUT it takes 5+ minutes until it actually opens my patcher.
so all i see is the league of legends logo, and when i click twice on the logo i get:
'PVP kernel has stopped working'

when i dont touch anything ( after 5 minutes ) the patcher finally opens.
it starts patching as usual, and gets stuck at 33% ( as usual ).
after a while between 5 and 60 munutes my windows just completely crashes and i get a blue windows error screen with this:
'DPC_WATCHDOG_VIOLATION'  this only happens when i want to patch LOL

now i've googled this error, and tried multiple solutions ( system recovery, update windows, update drivers manually ) but still it didnt work.

i've already tried http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3137270 (HarbringerGwyn's solution) but it didnt work. 

i have already reinstalled league of legends, that neither worked for me.

PS. i've always had the problem of the patcher getting stuck at 33%, so i wait 2 hours ( and i cant close the patcher, not even taskmanager ) and after 2 hours i shut down my laptop, restart it, and the patch is done somehow...

can someone please help me?

replies.body: The errors you are receiving may be due to a permissions issue that's blocking the patcher from scanning game files, or launching entirely.  I appreciate the troubleshooting done so far, and there are a few more steps that can be taken through our [Permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide.  Let me know if you still have any issues afterward!

alright, i tried all those steps.

i uninstalled league of legends, and reinstalled it afterwards on another hard drive ( not C drive but D drive with 500GB free space, because C might be busted or some shit )

i opened the patcher as admin, so it started patching.
but the patcher got stuck at 0% for 1+ hour, after that the patcher crashed and gave this error:
'BugsplatRC resource DLL not found'
now the patcher just shut down so i restarted my laptop, and reopend the patcher ( as admin ). now the patcher started at 33% right away
and at the moment i'm at 34% without any windows error shutdowns ( yet )

so, i'm not sure if it's fixed or not atm.
i'm at step 2/2: updating league of legends 3441 MB  ( 506KBps ) 34%


i'm highly annoyed and stressed the fuck out because my laptop is slow as shit when i'm patching, i'm strugling with typing this message because of it...

The error you received initially may have been due to the permissions issue being unable to scan files.  If you are at 34% now, then that's great!  Let it finish up and do it's thing.  As long as you don't get an unspecified error, you'll be good to go!

45% now!! this is great.
thank you very much for the quick responds man, i was thinking this would take ages.


i hope it's fixed now, i havent seen this much progres in the patch since 6.16 came out <3

Take heart!  I'll be around just in case.  :D  
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
